forum.content:
Every single day
I'm always eating alone,work,learn.
Day after day~Year by year~
sometimes,I feel lonely.
I hope someone to be with me.
because, I'm not machine. I'm human!
to be a man of temperature,but I know what is love. For this reason,I'm single
until this day. really really hope have a female to be with me.

只敢希望不敢奢望
forum.title: 我不是機器！我也是有溫度的人！
